findings.title: Unuse SafeMath in contracts
findings.description: The contract imported SafeMath library but didn't use it inside the contract, and Solidity 0.8.0+ already checks for overflow by default.

findings.title: Missing checks length of array functions
findings.description: The batchMint function in FishToken.sol files, batchSetTokensAllocation function in PreSale.sol files and batchCreateTimeLockedWallet function in TimeLockedWalletFactory.sol have missing checks for the length of array variables.

findings.title: Using transfer instead of safeTransfer and safeTransferFrom
findings.description: The contract uses transfer method instead of safeTransfer and safeTransferFrom which can cause issues when transferring tokens.
